item.description:

item.title: 啤酒禁令引发赞比亚与刚果边境冲突，铜矿出口受阻
item.description: 赞比亚贸易部长将于周一与刚果民主共和国的贸易部长会面，以解决导致两国边境周末关闭、世界第二大铜生产国出口受阻的贸易争端。【原文：Zambia’s trade minister will meet with counterparts in the Democratic Republic of Congo on Monday to resolve a trade spat that led to the weekend closure of their border, delaying exports from the world’s second-biggest copper producer.】

item.title: 主要政党称孟加拉国应尽快举行选举
item.description: 孟加拉国一个主要政党的一名高级成员说，孟加拉国必须尽快举行投票，以确保这个南亚国家的稳定与安全。【原文：Polls in Bangladesh must be held quickly to ensure stability and security in the South Asian nation, said a senior member of one of the country’s main political parties.】

item.title: 欧洲大面积烘烤，希腊半数地区进入最高火灾警戒状态
item.description: 本周伊始，欧洲大部分地区气温骤升，西班牙气温高达 40 摄氏度（104 华氏度），希腊半数地区处于红色火灾预警状态，英格兰也将迎来今年最热的一天。【原文：Much of Europe faces a searing start to the week, with Spain topping 40C (104F), half of Greece on red fire alert and England set for its hottest day of the year.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气交易接近 2024 年高点，吸引进口液化天然气
item.description: 由于对俄罗斯管道流量的担忧，欧洲天然气价格保持在 12 月以来的最高水平附近，为更多的海运进口提供了动力。【原文：European natural gas prices held near the highest levels since December following concerns over Russian pipeline flows, providing an incentive for more seaborne imports.】

item.title: 中国推动非洲锂需求激增，锁定关键电池金属
item.description: 中国矿商和提炼商正在推动非洲锂产量激增，摆脱了对供应过剩的担忧，以锁定这种关键电池金属的未来供应。【原文：Chinese miners and refiners are driving a surge in African lithium output, shrugging off concerns over a glut to lock in future supplies of the critical battery metal.】

item.title: 财报和 M&A 助力反弹，欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 欧洲股市周一连续第五天上涨，原因是在本周晚些时候发布一系列重要经济数据之前，投资者受到了盈利和交易达成的鼓舞。【原文：European stocks gained for a fifth straight day Monday as earnings and deal-making encouraged investors ahead of a number of key economic releases later in the week.】

item.title: 捷克通胀加速，央行打出谨慎宽松旗号
item.description: 捷克的通胀率在 7 月份意外加快，为央行进一步放宽货币政策提供了更多谨慎信号。【原文：Czech inflation unexpectedly accelerated in July, adding to signals for the central bank to exercise caution with further monetary-policy easing.】

item.title: Adnoc Gas 首次进入市场，液化天然气需求上升
item.description: Adnoc Gas 公司首席财务官彼得-范德里尔（Peter Van Driel）表示，随着越来越多的国家首次转向进口液化天然气，全球液化天然气消费量有望进一步增长。【原文：Global liquefied natural gas consumption is expected to increase further as more countries turn to imports for the first time, said Adnoc Gas’s Chief Financial Officer Peter Van Driel.】

item.title: 莫迪的反对者在 "兴登堡 "事件中要求塞比局长下台
item.description: 在兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）被指控对阿达尼集团（Adani Group）的调查存在不当行为后，印度政治反对派呼吁该国股票市场监管机构负责人辞职。【原文：India’s political opposition is calling on the head of the nation’s stock-market regulator to resign after Hindenburg Research alleged impropriety in its investigation against the Adani Group.】

item.title: 中国券商抑制债券交易，警告反弹来袭
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，自上周以来，至少有四家中国券商开始采取新措施，减少国内国债交易。【原文：At least four Chinese brokerages have started fresh measures to cut back trading of domestic government bonds since last week, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 沙索公司将因 30 亿美元减值报告全年亏损
item.description: 沙索有限公司（Sasol Ltd.）表示，在燃料公司计提 551 亿兰特（约合 30 亿美元）的税后减值后，该公司将报告全年亏损。【原文：Sasol Ltd. said it would report a loss for the full year after the fuels company booked 55.1 billion-rand ($3 billion) of impairments after tax.】

item.title: 阿达尼股价下跌，与印度监管机构的 "兴登堡 "之争愈演愈烈
item.description: 兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）指责印度市场监管机构负责人存在利益冲突，涉嫌阻止对这家总部位于美国的做空机构所声称的集团操纵和欺诈行为进行彻底调查，阿达尼集团股票随之下跌。【原文：Adani Group’s stocks fell after Hindenburg Research accused the head of India’s market regulator of having conflicts of interest that allegedly prevented a thorough probe into the US-based short seller’s claims of manipulation and fraud at the conglomerate.】

item.title: 加密初创企业在市场放缓之际筹集到更多风险投资资金
item.description: 加密初创公司在最近一个季度筹集了更多资金，但完成的交易却减少了，这反映了数字资产领域的广泛放缓。【原文：Crypto startups raised more money but closed fewer deals in the most recent quarter, mirroring the broader slowdown seen in the digital-asset world.】

item.title: 私人信贷进入风险地带，向消费者下巨额赌注
item.description:
随着银行的撤退，企业正在消费者贷款市场中抢占更大的份额。但最近的经济动荡和失业数据显示了潜在的危险。【原文：

Firms are grabbing a greater share of the consumer lending markets as banks retreat. But recent economic wobbles and jobless data show the potential perils. 

】

item.title: 2024 年德国经济几乎不会增长
item.description: 据经济学家称，德国经济在第二季度意外萎缩后，今年将面临几乎没有增长的前景。【原文：Germany faces the prospect of hardly any growth this year in the wake of the economy’s surprise second-quarter contraction, according to economists.】

item.title: 经济学家称，尽管法郎飙升，但瑞士央行将只再降息一次
item.description: 即使在交易员将赌注转向更积极的宽松政策之后，瑞士法郎最近的飙升也没有改变经济学家对瑞士国家银行利率路径的看法。【原文：The franc’s recent surge hasn’t changed economists’ views on the Swiss National Bank’s interest-rate path, even after traders pivoted bets toward more aggressive easing.】

item.title: 调查显示，欧洲央行将在 2025 年底前六次下调关键利率
item.description: 据经济学家称，欧洲中央银行目前可能在明年年底之前每季度下调一次存款利率，这一时间表将使其宽松周期结束的时间早于之前的预期。【原文：The European Central Bank is now likely to cut its deposit rate once a quarter through the end of next year, a timetable that will see its easing cycle end sooner than previously anticipated, according to economists.】

item.title: 澳门赌场股票因再次打击货币兑换而下滑
item.description: 澳门赌场运营商的股票周一下跌，因为这个全球最大的赌博中心正试图将非法货币兑换活动定为刑事犯罪，而这是中国赌客规避澳门严格的资本管制的一种常见方式。【原文：Shares of Macau casino operators declined Monday as the world’s biggest gambling hub seeks to criminalize illegal money-exchange activities, a common way for Chinese players to circumvent the country’s tight capital controls.】

item.title: 中国人民银行警告潜在风险，中国债券跌幅扩大
item.description: 中国 10 年期国债延续近期跌势，央行警告债市持续上涨可能带来市场风险。【原文：China’s 10-year bonds extended recent declines as the central bank warned about potential market risks arising from the relentless rally in the debt market.】

item.title: 外国投资者从中国撤出的资金创历史新高
item.description: 上一季度，外国投资者从中国撤出了创纪录的大量资金，跌幅为历史第二，这很可能反映了对世界第二大经济体的严重悲观情绪。【原文：Foreign investors pulled a record amount of money from China last quarter, with the second-only fall on record likely reflecting deep pessimism about the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 广州润发在债券兑付失败后考虑 "整体 "解决方案
item.description: 广州富力地产股份有限公司（Guangzhou R&F Properties Co., Ltd.）正在考虑为其海外债务寻求 "整体 "解决方案，因为该公司已经拖欠了 1.47 亿美元的美元票据票息，这凸显了中国房地产业日益加深的流动性危机。【原文：Guangzhou R&F Properties Co. is considering a “holistic” solution for its offshore debt after missing $147 million of coupon payments on already-extended dollar notes, underscoring the deepening liquidity crisis in China’s property sector.】

item.title: 中国建筑商凯撒力争在四周内敲定重组条款
item.description: 凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）计划在一个月内达成重组协议，因为这家陷入困境的中国建筑商将在四周后再次就清算申请进行抗辩。【原文：Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. plans to come up with a restructuring agreement within a month, as the troubled Chinese builder is set to defend against a liquidation petition again in four weeks.】

item.title: 印度股市在兴登堡-塞比之争中开局不温不火
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行二号人物豪瑟警告不要对预测 "过于自信
item.description: 澳大利亚央行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）警告说，在预测经济和货币政策时不要 "过于自信"，他说，更成熟的做法是从错误中吸取教训，并承认对未来知之甚少。【原文：Australian central bank Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser warned against “overconfidence” in forecasting the economy and monetary policy, saying a more mature approach is to learn from errors and acknowledge how little is known about the future.】

item.title: 担心重回股票全仓的交易员在权衡期权
item.description: 在经历了近期市场历史上最疯狂的一周之后，S&P 500 指数创下了自 2022 年以来最大的单日跌幅和最好的反弹，交易者不想重新完全投入股市是可以理解的。有些人现在正在研究期权。【原文：After one of the wildest weeks in recent market history — the S&P 500 Index posted both its biggest one-day slump and best rebound since 2022 — traders could be forgiven for not wanting to jump back in fully into stocks. Some are now are looking into options.】
